options.content: DevOps Dashboard 1.0

panels.description: Dashboard for SonarQube metrics aligned with Google SLI/SLO standards. SLI: % builds passing Quality Gate, Coverage %, Bug rate. SLO: 95% builds pass Quality Gate, Coverage >=80%. SLA: 99.9% builds without critical bugs.
panels.title: SonarQube Quality Dashboard

targets.rawSql: SELECT analysis_date AS "time", coverage FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date) ORDER BY analysis_date
SELECT analysis_date AS "time", bugs FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date) ORDER BY analysis_date
SELECT count(*) FROM commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
select count(distinct commit_user) from commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
select sum(additions+deletions) as lines_changed  from commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
select sum(files_changed)  from commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
select count(*) from pr_details WHERE $__timeFilter(start_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
select count(state) state from pr_details  WHERE state='closed' AND $__timeFilter(start_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
SELECT analysis_date AS "time", vulnerabilities FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date) ORDER BY analysis_date
SELECT analysis_date AS "time", code_smells FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date) ORDER BY analysis_date

SELECT
  repo_name AS "Repository",
  AVG(lead_time_in_seconds) / 3600 AS "Average Lead Time (Hours)"
FROM
  lead_time_to_change
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND
  repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
GROUP BY
  repo_name
ORDER BY
  "Average Lead Time (Hours)" DESC

panels.title: Lead Time to Change by Repository

targets.rawSql: SELECT commit_user, count(*) FROM commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) group by commit_user
SELECT quality_gate_status, COUNT(*) FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date) GROUP BY quality_gate_status
SELECT AVG(reliability_rating) FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date)
SELECT AVG(security_rating) FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date)
SELECT AVG(maintainability_rating) FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date)
select commit_user, sum(files_changed)  from commit_details WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) group by commit_user
select commit_user, sum(additions+deletions) as lines_changed  from commit_details  WHERE $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) group by commit_user

panels.description: SLI: % builds passing Quality Gate. SLO: >=95% green, >=80% orange, <80% red.

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE quality_gate_status = 'OK') * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS pass_rate FROM sonarqube_results WHERE $__timeFilter(analysis_date)

panels.title: Quality Gate SLO Compliance

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', commit_date) AS "time",
  repo_name,
  COUNT(*) AS "Commits"
FROM 
  commit_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(commit_date) AND
  repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
GROUP BY 
  "time", repo_name
ORDER BY 
  "time" ASC;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', end_date) AS "time",
  repo_name,
  COUNT(*) AS "Merges"
FROM 
  public.pr_details
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND merged = true
  AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) 
GROUP BY 
  "time", repo_name
ORDER BY 
  "time" ASC;

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', completed_at) AS "time",
  repo_name,
  COUNT(*) AS "Builds"
FROM 
  change_failure_rate_runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND
  repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
GROUP BY 
  "time", repo_name
ORDER BY 
  "time" ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM change_failure_rate_runs
WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM change_failure_rate_runs
WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) AND conclusion = 'success'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM change_failure_rate_runs
WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) AND conclusion = 'failure'

SELECT AVG(duration_in_seconds) / 60 FROM build_durations
WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})

panels.description:
Value Score
<1 hour 0-17
<1 day 18-34
1 day - 1 week 35-51
1 week - 1 month 52-67
1 month - 6 months 68-84
> 6 months 85-100

targets.rawSql:
WITH metric AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN conclusion = 'failure' THEN 1 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 0) as value FROM change_failure_rate_runs WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
)
SELECT CASE WHEN value <= 15 THEN 10 WHEN value <= 30 THEN 8 WHEN value <= 45 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END
FROM metric

panels.title: Change Failure Rate Score

panels.description:
Value Score
<1 hour 9-10
<1 day 7-8
1 day - 1 week 5-6
1 week - 1 month 3-4
1 month - 6 months 1-2
> 6 months 0

targets.rawSql:
WITH metric AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(AVG(time_to_recover_in_seconds) / 3600, 0) as value FROM incidents_for_mttr WHERE $__timeFilter(resolution_time) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
)
SELECT CASE WHEN value <= 1 THEN 10 WHEN value <= 24 THEN 8 WHEN value <= 168 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END
FROM metric

panels.title: MTTR Score

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  AVG(lead_time_in_seconds) / 3600
FROM 
  lead_time_to_change
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND
  repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})

SELECT COALESCE((CAST(COUNT(*) AS REAL) / NULLIF(EXTRACT(DAYS FROM (MAX(completed_at) - MIN(completed_at))), 0)) * 30.44, 0) FROM change_failure_rate_runs WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) AND conclusion = 'success'

SELECT
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN conclusion = 'failure' THEN 1 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
FROM
  change_failure_rate_runs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})

SELECT
  AVG(time_to_recover_in_seconds) / 3600
FROM
  incidents_for_mttr
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(resolution_time) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})

panels.description:
Value (Range) Score
< 1 hour 9-10
< 1 day 7-8
1 day - 1 week 5-6
1 week - 1 month 3-4
1 month - 6 months 1-2
> 6 months 0

targets.rawSql:
WITH metric AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(AVG(lead_time_in_seconds) / 3600, 99999) as value FROM lead_time_to_change WHERE $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
)
SELECT CASE 
  WHEN value <= 1 THEN 10
  WHEN value <= 24 THEN 8
  WHEN value <= 168 THEN 6
  WHEN value <= 720 THEN 4
  WHEN value <= 4380 THEN 2
  ELSE 0 
END
FROM metric

panels.title: Lead Time Score

panels.description:
Value Score
On Demand 9-10
1 hour - 1 day 7-8
1 day - 1 week 5-6
1 week - 1 month 3-4
1 month - 6 months 1-2
> 6 months 0

targets.rawSql:
WITH metric AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(CAST(COUNT(*) AS REAL) / NULLIF(EXTRACT(DAYS FROM (MAX(completed_at) - MIN(completed_at))), 0), 0) as value FROM change_failure_rate_runs WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) AND conclusion = 'success'
)
SELECT CASE WHEN value >= 1 THEN 10 WHEN value >= 0.14 THEN 8 WHEN value > 0.033 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END
FROM metric

panels.title: Deploy Frequency Score

panels.description:
Benchmarking
Elite - If score is >8-10
High - If score is >6-8
Medium - If score is >4-6
Low - If score is below 4

targets.rawSql:
WITH
lead_time AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(AVG(lead_time_in_seconds) / 3600, 8000) as value FROM lead_time_to_change WHERE $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
),
deploy_freq AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(CAST(COUNT(*) AS REAL) / NULLIF(EXTRACT(DAYS FROM (MAX(completed_at) - MIN(completed_at))), 0), 0) as value FROM change_failure_rate_runs WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring}) AND conclusion = 'success'
),
change_fail_rate AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN conclusion = 'failure' THEN 1 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 0) as value FROM change_failure_rate_runs WHERE $__timeFilter(completed_at) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
),
mttr AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(AVG(time_to_recover_in_seconds) / 3600, 0) as value FROM incidents_for_mttr WHERE $__timeFilter(resolution_time) AND repo_name IN (${repo:sqlstring})
),
scores AS (
  SELECT
    (CASE WHEN lt.value <= 24 THEN 10 WHEN lt.value <= 168 THEN 8 WHEN lt.value <= 720 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END) as lt_score,
    (CASE WHEN df.value >= 1 THEN 10 WHEN df.value >= 0.14 THEN 8 WHEN df.value > 0.033 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END) as df_score,
    (CASE WHEN cfr.value <= 15 THEN 10 WHEN cfr.value <= 30 THEN 8 WHEN cfr.value <= 45 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END) as cfr_score,
    (CASE WHEN m.value <= 1 THEN 10 WHEN m.value <= 24 THEN 8 WHEN m.value <= 168 THEN 5 ELSE 2 END) as mttr_score
  FROM lead_time lt, deploy_freq df, change_fail_rate cfr, mttr m
),
final_score AS (
  SELECT (lt_score + df_score + cfr_score + mttr_score) / 4.0 as score
  FROM scores
)
SELECT
  score as "Score (1-10)",
  CASE
    WHEN score >= 9 THEN 4
    WHEN score >= 7 THEN 3
    WHEN score >= 4 THEN 2
    ELSE 1
  END as "Rating"
FROM final_score

panels.title: Current Delivery Performance

list.definition:
SELECT repo_name FROM commit_details
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM pr_details
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM lead_time_to_change
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM incidents_for_mttr
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM change_failure_rate_runs
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM build_durations
ORDER BY repo_name
list.description: Filter by one or more repositories.
list.label: Repository
list.name: repo
list.query:
SELECT repo_name FROM commit_details
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM pr_details
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM lead_time_to_change
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM incidents_for_mttr
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM change_failure_rate_runs
UNION
SELECT repo_name FROM build_durations
ORDER BY repo_name
